invitation_en.bodyTemplate:
Hi {{firstName}}!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

lastNotice_en.bodyTemplate:
Dear {{firstName}},

Your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} is about to expire. Please note that payment was due within 7 days of registration and is now overdue. If we do not receive your payment within the next 24 hours, your registration will automatically be marked as expired.

Payment Information

Amount Due: {{paymentRequired}} NOK

Payment Options:

  • Vipps/MobilePay: (+47) 913 51 909
  • Bank Transfer: KrUltra, account no. 9802 46 25850
  • International Transfer:
    IBAN: NO61 9802 4625850
    BIC/SWIFT: DNBANOKKXXX

Payment Reference: {{eventShortName}}-{{eventEdition}}-{{registrationNumber}}

If you believe you have already paid and it hasn’t been reflected yet, please reply to this email to let us know. If your payment was made recently, your registration should be updated to “confirmed” shortly, and you will receive a confirmation email. You can check or update your registration anytime at the KrUltra Runners Hub.

Please contact us immediately if you think this message was sent in error.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please disregard this message.

newsletter_en.bodyTemplate:
KrUltra Newsletter

Hello {{firstName}},

Hope to bring you more relevant updates and news in the future!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you do not want to receive future newsletters from KrUltra or any of the KrUltra events, please reply and start your message with "UNSUBSCRIBE".

refund_en.bodyTemplate:
Dear {{firstName}},

We would like to inform you that your payment for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} has been refunded in accordance with the event’s cancellation and refund policy.

Refund Information

Unless you have agreed differently, your refund has been processed and sent to the same payment method used for your original transaction.

For most payment methods, other than bank transfers, the refund should appear almost immediately. In case of an international bank transfer, please allow a few business days for the transaction to be completed.

If you have any questions or believe something is incorrect, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}} in connection with your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}.

registration_cancellation_en.bodyTemplate:

Please reply to this email if you have any questions or objections that you want to air with us.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

registration_expiration_en.bodyTemplate:
Dear {{firstName}}

We want to inform you that your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} has expired.

Possible reasons for the expiry can be missing payments, or that the expiry date for the registration has been reached in case of a waiting-list entry. Any refunds for possible payments you have made for this event will be conducted in line with the events regulations.

Important: Please reply to this email immediately to notify us if you think the expiration is a mistake!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

message.subject: KUTC 2025 - Registration Update
KUTC 2025 – Invitation to register
message.html:
Hei Mats!

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Mats!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

message.subject: KUTC 2025 – Invitation to register
message.html:
Hei Stig Morten!

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Stig Morten!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

message.subject: KUTC 2025 – Invitation to register
message.html:
Hei Ulf!

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Ulf!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

message.subject: KUTC 2025 – Invitation to register
message.html:
Hei Torgeir!

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Torgeir!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Espen Halvorsen!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

message.subject: KUTC 2025 – Invitation to register
message.html:
Hei Mats!

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Mats!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

We want to inform you that your registration for Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge 2025 has expired.

KrUltra

message.subject: KUTC 2025 – Invitation to register
message.html:
Hei Lars Erik!

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Lars Erik!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

message.subject: KUTC 2025 – Invitation to register
message.html:
Hei Anne Luksengård!

(english version below)

Tradisjonen tro åpner påmeldingen til KUTC i påsken, og som en av deltakerne de siste tre årene får du herved en mulighet til å melde deg på før vi annonserer til alle og enhver at påmeldingen har åpnet.

I år har jeg laget et nytt påmeldingssystem, og det er nok bare i en beta-versjon ennå. Derfor er jeg interessert i å høre fra deg dersom du får problemer med påmeldingen eller har tips til hva som bør forbedres.

Påmelding gjøres ved å gå til https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Håper se deg på startstreken igjen 11. oktober i år!

Med vennlig hilsen,
Torgeir

Hi Anne Luksengård!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
Torgeir

message.subject: KUTC 2025 - Refund issued
message.html:
Dear Torgeir,

We would like to inform you that your payment for Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge 2025 has been refunded in accordance with the event’s cancellation and refund policy.

Refund Information

Unless you have agreed differently, your refund has been processed and sent to the same payment method used for your original transaction.

For most payment methods, other than bank transfers, the refund should appear almost immediately. In case of an international bank transfer, please allow a few business days for the transaction to be completed.

If you have any questions or believe something is incorrect, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to torgeir.kruke@gmail.com in connection with your registration for Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge 2025.
